levelledPara.title: Purpose
levelledPara.para: The sensor bay environment supports active payloads mounted forward of the BH-STA350 bulkhead. It provides structural housing, thermal management, and electromagnetic shielding for mission-critical sensors.

levelledPara.title: Sensor Types
levelledPara.para: The bay accommodates radar AESA arrays, GNSS antennas, and SATCOM modules. These sensors require precise alignment, low-vibration mounting, and controlled airflow for thermal dissipation.

levelledPara.title: Structural Context
levelledPara.para: The sensor bay is enclosed by the radome and interfaces with Frame C0 and the firewall layer. It includes cable routing channels, EMI gaskets, and modular mounting brackets.

levelledPara.title: Compliance
levelledPara.para: The environment is designed to meet DO-160G standards for electromagnetic compatibility, vibration, and temperature control. It supports the COMPARTMENT_BOUNDARY_VERIFIED and FIREWALL_COMPLIANT badges.
